node.doctext:
[Jesus Freak|What will people think when they read that you're a Jesus Freak?]

This is a group of noders who have sincerely and publicly declared that they are [Christian]. This is to say that according to their own lights and the teachings of their church, they have placed their [faith] in [Jesus Christ] as [Lord] and [Savior].

[% return '

If you\'re currently keeping your [light] under a bushel for whatever reason, know that if you decide to come out, we\'ve got your back.

' unless grep {$_ == $$USER{user_id}} @{$$NODE{group}}; <<__HERE__

This may mean something very different to you than it does to them. You may even consider their church's [doctrine]s to be so out of true with [scripture] (or [tradition] or [reason] or prophetic [revelation]) that you feel they shouldn't properly be called "Christians" at all. [It's just a node. It's not the freakin' Council of Nicaea.|This is fine.] Regarding our differences in belief and practice it's as [John Wesley] said in his sermon The Catholic Spirit: "We will talk of them, if need be, at a more convenient season." The only grounds for asking that someone be removed from this list is if you have [substantial] proof that their public profession of faith was somehow [theonomist|insincere].

Our messages are archived at [usergroup message archive].
Our collaborative node is [The Christian Sanctuary].
Go in peace.

__HERE__ %]

/msg [per ou] to be added or removed from this list.


Testify! [{weblog:3}]
